law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 38, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. --Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (4) and (11). -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 4, effective June 19, 1958. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2062a-7, 2062a-14.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Certificate of death -- Medical certificate -- Requirements.
